original_text: He will bring them together like prisoners in a deep hole. That will be their prison. They will be there for a time, and then he will come to punish them. He will bring them together like prisoners in a deep hole. That will be their prison. They will be there for a time, and then he will come to punish them. He will bring them together like prisoners in a deep hole. That will be their prison. They will be there for a time, and then he will come to punish them.
korean_text: 그들이 죄수가 깊은 옥에 모임 같이 모이게 되고 옥에 갇혔다가 여러 날 후에 형벌을 받을 것이라

sentences.original_text: like prisoners in a deep hole
They will be there for a time
sentences.korean_translation: 그들은 한 동안 그곳에 있을 것이다

sentences.original_text: and then he will come to punish them
sentences.korean_translation: 그리고 나서 그가 그들을 벌주기 위해 올 것이다
